mapper.select: SELECT c.cartid as cartId, c.productid as productId, c.recipeid as recipeId, c.qty as amount, prod.pname as productName, price.priceid as priceId, price.price as price, event.eventid as eventId, event.salerate as saleRate, img.image as imagePath FROM cart c INNER JOIN product prod ON c.productid = prod.productid INNER JOIN price ON c.productid = price.productid LEFT JOIN event ON c.productid = event.productid LEFT JOIN product_image img on c.productid = img.productid WHERE c.userid = #{userId}
